DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate efficacy safety Perrigo 's test formulation Clindamycin Phosphate Benzoyl Peroxide Topical Gel 1.2 % /2.5 % compare already market formulation , Acanya gel patient acne vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Clindamycin Phosphate Benzoyl Peroxide Topical Gel 1.2 % /2.5 % Acanya® Topical Gel Treatment Acne Vulgaris
